Package be.ecam.ms_studenthelp.Database.repositories

Interface TagRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<TagEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<TagEntity,Long>
@Repository public interface TagRepository extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<TagEntity,Long>
Repository for the "tags" tables.
